hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT INTL_ID, INTH_ID, LINE_ID, HEAD_ID, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, WAREHOUSE_CODE, QTY_BILL, PRICE_BILL, CONSIGNMENT_TYPE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, PRICE, UPDATE_DATE, NOTE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_CREATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM INTEF_CCS_SO_ORDER_G WHERE 1=1 <<AND INTL_ID LIKE :intlId>> <<AND INTH_ID LIKE :inthId>> <<AND LINE_ID LIKE :lineId>> <<AND HEAD_ID LIKE :headId>> <<AND ITEM_CODE LIKE :itemCode>> <<AND ITEM_NAME LIKE :itemName>> <<AND WAREHOUSE_CODE LIKE :warehouseCode>> <<AND QTY_BILL LIKE :qtyBill>> <<AND PRICE_BILL LIKE :priceBill>> <<AND CONSIGNMENT_TYPE LIKE :consignmentType>> <<AND ATTRIBUTE1 LIKE :attribute1>> <<AND ATTRIBUTE2 LIKE :attribute2>> <<AND ATTRIBUTE3 LIKE :attribute3>> <<AND ATTRIBUTE4 LIKE :attribute4>> <<AND ATTRIBUTE5 LIKE :attribute5>> <<AND PRICE LIKE :price>> <<AND UPDATE_DATE > :updateDateFrom>> <<AND UPDATE_DATE <= :updateDateTo + 1>> <<AND NOTE LIKE :note>> <<AND CREATE_BY LIKE :createBy>> <<AND CREATE_DATE > :createDateFrom>> <<AND CREATE_DATE <= :createDateTo + 1>> <<AND LAST_CREATE_BY LIKE :lastCreateBy>> <<AND LAST_UPDATE_DATE > :lastUpdateDateFrom>> <<AND LAST_UPDATE_DATE <= :lastUpdateDateTo + 1>>
